name: GreatConversations
0:
”Alexa open great conversations”
”Alexa ask great conversations for imagine”
”Alexa ask great conversations for deep”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: great conversations
des:
Great conversations is a great experience, a true pleasure. And they often start with asking great questions. And that is exactly what you get here: questions for the memory lane, for things you like, for things you might dream about. Questions for the imagination, the funny ideas. Questions for the reflections, the deeper stuff. A taste:

You are building your own city. What is it like? If you were invisible for a day, what would you do?
What is something that you ve never done but would like to try? Would you accept a one-way ticket to mars? If no, why? If yes, why? If we learn from our mistakes, why are we often so afraid to make one?
priv:

The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
